mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM WF_TEMPLATE_NOTICE A WHERE GUID=#GUID#
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WF_TEMPLATE_NOTICE (GUID, TEMPLATEGUID, TEMPLATEACTRTGUID, HASORGANIGER, HASLASTEXECUTOR, HASNEXTEXECUTOR, HASALLEXECUTOR, HASLEADER, NOTICETYPE, CREATEUSERGUID, CREATETIME, UPDATEUSERGUID, UPDATETIME ) values(#GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TEMPLATEGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TEMPLATEACTRTGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #HASORGANIGER:VARCHAR:NULL#, #HASLASTEXECUTOR:VARCHAR:NULL#, #HASNEXTEXECUTOR:VARCHAR:NULL#, #HASALLEXECUTOR:VARCHAR:NULL#, #HASLEADER:VARCHAR:NULL#, #NOTICETYPE:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP# )
mapper.update:
update wf_template_notice
UPDATEUSERGUID = #UPDATEUSERGUID#, UPDATETIME = #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#,
TEMPLATEACTRTGUID = #TEMPLATEACTRTGUID#,
TEMPLATEGUID = #TEMPLATEGUID#,
HASORGANIGER = #HASORGANIGER#,
HASLASTEXECUTOR = #HASLASTEXECUTOR#,
HASNEXTEXECUTOR = #HASNEXTEXECUTOR#,
HASALLEXECUTOR = #HASALLEXECUTOR#,
HASLEADER = #HASLEADER#,
NOTICETYPE = #NOTICETYPE#,
where GUID = #GUID#
